solution_line_template: After the {discount_percent*100}% discount, the t-shirt cost {original_price} * {discount_percent} = $<<{original_price}*{discount_percent}={discounted_price}>>{discounted_price}.
So in all, the {num_friends} friends spent {num_friends} * ${discounted_price} = $<<{num_friends}*{discounted_price}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
